mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project(title, description, content, cover_image, link, order_num, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{content}, #{coverImage}, #{link}, #{orderNum}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, description, content, cover_image AS coverImage, link, order_num AS orderNum, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM project WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, title, description, content, cover_image AS coverImage, link, order_num AS orderNum, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM project ORDER BY order_num ASC

SELECT id, title, description, content, cover_image AS coverImage, link, order_num AS orderNum, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM project ORDER BY order_num ASC, create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE project SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, content = #{content}, cover_image = #{coverImage}, link = #{link}, order_num = #{orderNum}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id AS tagId, t.name AS tagName, t.slug AS tagSlug, t.description AS tagDescription, t.color AS tagColor, COUNT(p.id) AS articleCount FROM tag t LEFT JOIN project_tag pt ON t.id = pt.tag_id LEFT JOIN project p ON pt.project_id = p.id GROUP BY t.id, t.name, t.slug, t.description, t.color ORDER BY articleCount DESC, t.name ASC

SELECT p.id, p.title, p.description, p.content, p.cover_image AS coverImage, p.link, p.order_num AS orderNum, p.create_time AS createTime, p.update_time AS updateTime FROM project p INNER JOIN project_tag pt ON p.id = pt.project_id WHERE pt.tag_id = #{tagId} ORDER BY p.order_num ASC, p.create_time DESC
